item.title: My Manga Tracking List
item.author: hello@forevergenin.com (Premkumar Subramanian)
item.description: Last updated on September 27, 2017 “Every form of addiction is bad, no matter whether the narcotic be alcohol, morphine or idealism.” ― C.G. Jung This is my official track list for all the Mangas/Manhwas I have completed or currently reading. Currently Reading: One Piece 892 Tales of Demons and Gods 108 Gamble Fish 1 Noblesse 496 Spirit Blade Mountain 137 D.Gray-Man 225 Adventures of Sindbad - Prototype 139 Blood and Steel 72 Witch Hunter 183 Boruto: Naruto Next Generations 14 Berserk 353 Kingdom 543 Ao No Exorcist 96 Freezing 215 Tokyo Ghoul:re 156 Rurouni Kenshin: Hokkaido Arc 3 Nanatsu no Taizai 252 Cavalier Of The Abyss 136 Knight Run 170 Nanatsu no Taizai: Seven Days 6 Hunter X Hunter 363 A Thousand Years Ninetails 86 Onepunch Man 134 Shingeki no Kyojin - Lost Girls 2 Freezing Zero 38 Dragon Ball Super 32 The Gamer 206 The God of High School 346 Shingeki no Kyojin 102 King of Hell 345 Kubera 324 Golden Kamui 88 Vinland Saga 134 Attack On Titan - Before The Fall 11 Shingeki no Kyojin - Birth of Levi: Kuinaki Sentaku 10 City of Dead Sorcerer 138 Minamoto-kun Monogatari 266 Break Blade 86 Fairy Tail Blue Mistral Wendel’s Adventure 2 Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari 40 Tale of Eun Aran 83 Abide in the Wind 4 Fairy Tail Gaiden - Kengami no Souryuu 15 Tale of the Fighting Freak, Path of the Warrior - Blood and Steel 3 Ouroboros 107 Tales of the unusual 178 Baki - Son of Ogre 161 Kyoukai no Rinne 213 Urusei Yatsura 7 Magician 374 White Epic 97 Ruler of the land 532 Trinity Wonder 31 Black Haze 208 Black Clover 117 Desire Climax 7 Blade of the immortal 20 Tsuyokute New Saga 47 Akame ga Kiru!

item.title: Naruto comes to an end
item.author: hello@forevergenin.com (Premkumar Subramanian)
item.description: Finally, after much deliberation I have decided to spend some time on maintaining a personal blog (more about this decision later). Now the question is what should be my first post? Much like most of the decisions I have made in my life I left this one as well to randomness and I stumbled upon this article at Kotaku. Though it was my first manga, the truth is I was not worried much about the end.
